dict.acceptation: 泥土；污垢，污泥；下流想法；恶意中伤的话；

sent.orig: The window has always been free from the concepts of dirt and freedom from dirt.
sent.trans: 窗子一如既往的离于“尘垢”这个概念，也离于尘垢本身。

sent.orig: Life is going to shovel dirt on you, all kinds of dirt.
sent.trans: 生活总是要面对各种各样铲向你的土。

sent.orig: It is skid-proof, safe and dust-proof after cleaning heavy dirt (heavy greasy dirt) sites.
sent.trans: 清洁重污垢（重油污）场合后，防滑、安全、防灰尘。

sent.orig: Only the wealthy had something other than dirt, hence the saying "dirt poor."
sent.trans: 只有富人家不是这样，因而有了dirtpoor（极贫困的）的说法。

sent.orig: In order to carry out this important task, I had to eat dirt.
sent.trans: 为完成这项重要的任务，我不得不忍辱负重。
